competitors.name: Cadence Design Systems
competitors.notes: Primary competitor offering comprehensive suite of EDA tools and IP products

competitors.name: Mentor Graphics
competitors.notes: Major competitor providing EDA software and hardware solutions, later acquired by Siemens in 2017

competitors.name: Magma Design Automation
competitors.notes: Significant competitor with patent disputes, acquired by Synopsys in 2011 for $507 million

context: Synopsys, Inc. is a electronic design automation company focused on chip design software, IP, and software security. FPGA prototyping. Software security emerging.
